original_title: Och Piccadilly Circus ligger inte i Kumla
overview: In the summer of 1967, Kumla is shaken by a shocking event. That summer, the life of 17-year-old Mauritz life will also change. He begins a fumbling romance with the girl next door, but through music he longs to leave the small town and see the world.
title: Och Piccadilly Circus ligger inte i Kumla
